availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel G. Dalton (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan C. G. Dalton in Logan County, Kentucky, on January 31, 1857. Faher of Lula C. Dalton. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Tharps District, p. 143.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film 000364550#, p. 159.
Find A Grave, "Daniel G. Dalton (March 4, 1834-January 16, 1914)," Memorial #19582316, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19582316 (accessed July 24, 2018).
